# Intro to R: A Hands on Tutorial {.unnumbered}

This book contains the materials for *Intro to R: A hands-on tutorial*, a multi-class R training hosted by the [Urban Institute R Users Group](https://urbaninstitute.github.io/r-at-urban/).

Core lessons include:

1.  Data visualization

2.  Data munging (analysis)

3.  Getting data into and out of R

4.  Iteration

5.  Putting everything together
